text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Can this imbecile say COVID19 instead of saying “ the invisible enemy “ or invisible scourge “Maybe when the dolt sees COVID19 on the paper he can’t comprehend it or pronounce it.What a fucking gem #RemoveTrumpToday #StopAiringTrumpLies #25theAmendmentNow #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
